import Mathlib

open Filter

theorem seq_max_limit_nonneg {x : â„• â†’ â„} {l : â„} (h : Tendsto x atTop (ð“ l)) :
  Tendsto (fun n => max (x n) 0) atTop (ð“ (max l 0)) âˆ§ 0 â‰¤ max l 0 := by sorry

import Mathlib

open Filter

theorem seq_max_limit_nonneg {x : â„• â†’ â„} {l : â„} (h : Tendsto x atTop (nhds l)) :
  Tendsto (fun n => max (x n) 0) atTop (nhds (max l 0)) âˆ§ 0 â‰¤ max l 0 := by sorry
